[
    FullOpeningTag(
        Span {
            line: 1,
            column: 1,
            position: 0,
        },
    ),
    Expression {
        expression: Nowdoc {
            value: "Hello, {$name}!",
        },
        ending: Semicolon(
            Span {
                line: 5,
                column: 4,
                position: 35,
            },
        ),
    },
]
